text: nishchay allaah ne apane rasool ko sachcha sapana dikhaaya, sach ke anusaar. tum avashy pravesh karoge masjide haraam mein, yadi allaah ne chaaha, nirbhay hokar, apane sir mundaate tatha baal kataravaate hue, tumhen kisee prakaar ka bhay nahin hoga,[1] vah jaanata hai jise tum nahin jaanate. isile pradaan kar dee tumhen is (masjide haraam mein pravesh) se pahale, ek sameep (jaldee) kee[2] vijay
